definitions.definition: The square board used in the game of chess , subdivided into eight rows of eight squares each, the squares in each row and column being of alternating colours.
A mathematical construction based on this pattern of squares

main_definition: ( chess ) The square board used in the game of chess , subdivided into eight rows of eight squares each, the squares in each row and column being of alternating colours.
secondary_definitions: ( topology ) A mathematical construction based on this pattern of squares
